subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Arron Afflalo scored 20 points, Carmelo Anthony added 16, and the Knicks’ starters spent much of the second half on the bench during a 107-97 win over the woeful 76ers.
snippet: Arron Afflalo scored 20 points, Carmelo Anthony added 16, and the Knicks’ starters spent much of the second half on the bench during a 107-97 win over the woeful 76ers.
